channel.title: Stat problem
channel.description:
Ok my server for some dumb reason when you train the stat screen doesnt show the new lvl it stays at 1/1 but when you logout it goes to the correct stat number.
I really need help with this plz help me!

item.title: Stat problem
item.dc:creator: @laxmaster213 laxmaster213
item.description:
@laxmaster213 wrote:

so do that code

public void updateSkills() {
sendQuest("@whi@"+playerLevel[0]+"", 4004);
sendQuest("@lre@"+getLevelForXP(playerXP[0])+"", 4005);
}

for all or just the

sendQuest("@whi@"+playerLevel[0]+"", 4004);
sendQuest("@lre@"+getLevelForXP(playerXP[0])+"", 4005);
}

also where should i put it

Read full topic

item.title: Stat problem
item.dc:creator: @madgamer madgamer
item.description:
@madgamer wrote:

you added it in the wrong place, and you would still have to add all the other sendQuest ID’s for the other stat icons.

Read full topic

item.title: Stat problem
item.dc:creator: @laxmaster213 laxmaster213
item.description:
@laxmaster213 wrote:

client.java:7: class, interface, or enum expected
public void updateSkills() {
^
client.java:9: class, interface, or enum expected
sendQuest("@lre@"+getLevelForXP(playerXP[0])+"", 4005);
^
client.java:10: class, interface, or enum expected
}
^
3 errors
Finished!
Press any key to continue . . .

is what i got when i did that

Read full topic

item.title: Stat problem
item.dc:creator: @madgamer madgamer
item.description:
@madgamer wrote:

add a method that updates the icons whenever you level up

something like this.

public void updateSkills() { sendQuest("@whi@"+playerLevel[0]+"", 4004); sendQuest("@lre@"+getLevelForXP(playerXP[0])+"", 4005); }
and add the rest of the frames for the other skills.

Read full topic
